content.title: Add a Placeholder to the Component
content.body:
1. From the upper-left corner of Iris, in the Templates explorer, expand Components and select the component userEntry.emailField.
  2. From the upper-right corner of Iris, in the Properties panel, click the Component tab.
  3. Modify the placeholder value to Email ID.

You will notice that the placeholder value is now modified in the Contact form also.
